channel.title: Scientist Idle Animations.
channel.description: Minor issue, but still should be at some point addressed: The idle animations of scientists, for instance in the beginning exploring Black Mesa before the test chamber, animations like scientists scratching the back of their head, or stretching their arms, folding them, their hands clip awkwardly through their heads and bodies.

item.title: Scientist Idle Animations.
item.dc:creator: NathanOrSomething
item.description:
Minor issue, but still should be at some point addressed: The idle animations of scientists, for instance in the beginning exploring Black Mesa before the test chamber, animations like scientists scratching the back of their head, or stretching their arms, folding them, their hands clip awkwardly through their heads and bodies.

Read full topic
